title: Shopaholic

properties.name: description
properties.value: Shopaholic is a Steam achievement task, which requires the player to "Visit the General Stores in Lumbridge, Falador, Varrock, Edgeville, Rimmington, Al-kharid and Karamja (Musa point)" to be completed. The order in which these stores are visited does not matter for the completion of this achievement. Players only need to enter the store building to make progress towards this achievement.

content:
Shopaholic
Released 24 February 2021 (Update)
Task Visit the General Stores in Lumbridge, Falador, Varrock, Edgeville, Rimmington, Al-kharid and Karamja (Musa point)
Members No
Area Unknown (edit)
Reward None
Diary Steam achievements
Diary master None

Shopaholic is a Steam achievement task, which requires the player to "Visit the General Stores in Lumbridge, Falador, Varrock, Edgeville, Rimmington, Al-kharid and Karamja (Musa point)" to be completed. The order in which these stores are visited does not matter for the completion of this achievement. Players only need to enter the store building to make progress towards this achievement.

Note that the Steam Community page may not accurately track the completion of this achievement. Once all of the stores have been visited, players will receive this achievement even if Steam did not accurately track the amount of stores visited before this point.

The recommended order to complete this achievement, other than through casual gameplay, is as follows:

  • Lumbridge — Recommended to buy a spade for the X Marks the Spot quest.
  • Al Kharid — Recommended to start Prince Ali Rescue while in the city.
  • Varrock — Recommended to visit Thessalia's clothes store across the street for the FashionScape achievement.
  • Edgeville — Can be reached by going around the west wall of the Grand Exchange
  • Falador — Walk south-west from Edgeville to reach Falador.
  • Rimmington — Continue south from Falador. Recommended to craft air runes on the way to Rimmington to complete the Breath of Fresh Air achievement.
  • Karamja — Take the boat from Port Sarim (30 coins). Also the location for the Fisherman's Friend achievement.
A map of all required general stores.

'''Shopaholic''' is a [[Steam achievement]] task, which requires the player to "Visit the [[General Store]]s in [[Lumbridge]], [[Falador]], [[Varrock]], [[Edgeville]], [[Rimmington]], [[Al Kharid|Al-kharid]] and [[Musa Point|Karamja (Musa point)]]" to be completed. The order in which these stores are visited does not matter for the completion of this achievement. Players only need to enter the store building to make progress towards this achievement.

Note that the Steam Community page may not accurately track the completion of this achievement. Once all of the stores have been visited, players will receive this achievement even if Steam did not accurately track the amount of stores visited before this point.

The recommended order to complete this achievement, other than through casual gameplay, is as follows: {{Checklist|
* [[Lumbridge]] — Recommended to buy a [[spade]] for the [[X Marks the Spot]] quest.
* [[Al Kharid]] — Recommended to start [[Prince Ali Rescue]] while in the city.
* [[Varrock]] — Recommended to visit [[Thessalia]]'s [[Thessalia's Fine Clothes.|clothes store]] across the street for the [[FashionScape]] achievement.
* [[Edgeville]] — Can be reached by going around the west wall of the [[Grand Exchange]]
* [[Falador]] — Walk south-west from Edgeville to reach Falador.
* [[Rimmington]] — Continue south from Falador. Recommended to craft [[air rune]]s on the way to Rimmington to complete the [[Breath of Fresh Air]] achievement.
* [[Musa Point|Karamja]] — Take the boat from [[Port Sarim]] ({{Coins|30}} coins). Also the location for the [[Fisherman's Friend]] achievement.
}}
